item.title: Ball Tracking and Chasing Robot using ROS and Gazebo
item.description: April 2022 Utilized raw camera data from a Turtlebot in Gazebo using ROS for performing Image Masking using OpenCV Calculated the centroid of object using Moments and then tracked the position of object in the robot’s Field of View Implemented a proportional velocity controller to follow the object You can find the code repository for this project on my GitHub
